subject: Voice inflections?
author: mrscaptainjack2
full_text:
I was googling about AM radio reception, and I came across the below exchange on a forum.  It talks about using the box to find missing persons (which I didn't know was possible), and the conversation mentions hearing specific voice inflections and recognizing a dead person's specific voice on the box.  My question is, do any of you get a recognizable voice?  The voices I get always sound robotic, although I do get clearly male or female voices.  

http://www.itcbridge.com/forum/view_topic.php?id=515&forum_id=31
